data.convo: Are you ready ? Ready for what ? Ready for the big switch . What are you talking about ? The nation is switching to digital TV . Oh . Of course I'm ready . Did you buy the converter ? No , I don't need a converter because I bought a digital TV . How much was that ? It was only about $ 120 for a 13 - inch screen . Does it pick up any digital channels ? Oh , yes . I get six Korean channels but nothing in English !
